715778f-a.text: I attended P.S. 115 back in the 1930's; this picture is looking up towards St. Nicholas Ave.  Used to have bagel vendors outside the school when classes dismissed - they were a treat!  My Aunt & Uncle Pappas lived @ 601 W. 177th St. (the building in the lower left of the photo) on the 6th floor, and I lived in an apartment on the corner of 177th St. and Amsterdam Ave.
715778f-a.folder: 177th Street (West) & St. Nicholas Avenue, Manhattan, NY
